title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; simple chat, embed, pull, and list operations.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with prompts history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API; chat, generate, and pull models.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama supporting chat, generate, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET/C# SDK for Ollama with chat and generate endpoints.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for running Ollama containerized with GPU support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB and Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin to run local LLM completions on your notes using Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-chatbox
summary: Lightweight React component library for embedding Ollama chat widgets into web apps.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for chatting with local models.
